stories.text:
Hello HN,

People who own smart watches is it worth it and has it improved your productivity in general.

I’m planning onto buying an apple watch probably going for SE since its cheaper and affordable.

The biggest reason I want an Apple Watch is to stay away from my phone but remain connected so I don’t miss important calls/texts
stories.title: Ask HN: Is it worth owning a smart watch

stories.text: HW startups can be expensive to run. I wonder if anyone has experience monetizing their hw product in a nin conventional way. Things like: consulting, selling courses etc. based on the gained knowledge. Any thoughts?
stories.title: Ask HN: Alternative ways to monetize a Hardware startup?

stories.text:
I've got an application in development. It's currently in a small private beta. Most of the functionality has been implemented, but I've already gotten feedback from users that it's hard to intuit how to use the advanced features.

I want to enlist the help of a UX designer, and since I'm potentially going to be doing a lot of work based on whatever they come up with, I want to find someone good.

I know HN runs a monthly freelancer thread, and I'm familiar with Upwork. Anywhere else I should be looking? Any other advice?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do I find a great freelance UX designer?
